collections.title: Collections & Folders
collections.description: Organize your API requests using Collections and Folders. Keep your workflow efficient by grouping related endpoints and structuring your API testing environment.

curl.title: cURL Integration
curl.description: Solo provides seamless integration with cURL, allowing you to import existing cURL commands and export your requests as cURL for use in terminals or scripts.

graphql.title: GraphQL
graphql.description: Solo provides full support for GraphQL APIs with schema introspection, query validation, and an intuitive editor.

grpc.title: gRPC
grpc.description: Solo provides comprehensive support for testing and debugging gRPC services with schema introspection and request building.

http-requests.title: HTTP Requests
http-requests.description: Learn how to make HTTP requests with Solo to test and debug your REST APIs.

intro.title: Getting Started with Solo
intro.description: Welcome to Solo, your powerful and simplified HTTP client for testing, developing, and debugging APIs.

offline-first.title: Offline-First Architecture
offline-first.description: Solo is designed with an offline-first approach, meaning all your data is stored locally on your machine. No cloud accounts, no internet dependency, complete privacy.

variables.title: Variables
variables.description: Variables in Solo allow you to create reusable, dynamic values across your requests. Use variables to manage different environments, avoid hardcoding values, and keep your API configurations flexible.
